49
Environmental Management
We are committed to protecting and enhancing the environment. As part of our 
efforts to improve the health of our nation’s communities, we pursue our mission as 
prudent stewards of the environment. We strive to identify products and services 
that not only help our members to protect the environment as discussed in the 
section on Supply Chain Management, but also seek to integrate environmentally 
friendly practices into our own operations.
